briefTitle: Decision Aids for Tamoxifen Treatment in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Utilization of Decision Aids for Tamoxifen Treatment in Breast Cancer Patients: A Randomized Controlled Trial.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in Knowledge of Tamoxifen Scale
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients who are recommended to undergo tamoxifen treatment in National Cancer Center, Korea
* - Age at least 18 years and more

Exclusion Criteria:

* Age under 18 years
* Inability to read or speak Korean
* Disagree to provide a written informed consent
